p: There was no significant difference in the reported feeling of presence between the Coral ( M = 5.00, SD = 0.70) or Scuba Diver ( M = 5.18, SD = 0.76) experimental conditions [ t (45) = âˆ’0.84, p = 0.41, d = 0.24], nor did we find differences in responses to the individual presence items across conditions.
